pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ridge Regression and Other Kernels for Genomic Selection // Software for genomic prediction with the RR-BLUP mixed model (Endelman 2011, doi:10.3835/plantgenome2011.08.0024). One application is to estimate marker effects by ridge regression; alternatively, BLUPs can be calculated based on an additive relationship matrix or a Gaussian kernel.
